titles.title: Housing Co-op Tax Correction Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of cooperative housing corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Hearing Held on Issue by Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Housing Co-op Tax Correction Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude cooperative housing corporations from the limitations on deductions incurred by certain membership organizations in transactions with their members. Prohibits patronage losses of an organization from being used to offset earnings which are not patronage earnings. Specifies earnings to be treated as patronage earnings in the case of cooperative housing corporations.
